column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3:
強くなったね…貴方は本当に強くなった
ミファーの祈りも もっと役に立てるはず
column4:
You're so strong...so much stronger
than before. The power of Mipha's Grace
will now recharge much faster.

column3:
今の貴方なら きっと救える
このハイラルと そして… お城で待つ姫様を…
column4:
As powerful as you are, I am certain you
can save Hyrule...as well as the princess
who awaits you.

column3:
…やっぱり凄いね
私は何も出来ずに あいつに倒されたのに…
column4:
You are truly exceptional. That thing took
my life before I could even fight back.

column3:
今のリンクなら ガノンにだって負けないと思う
私の祈りも貴方を助けるから…
column4:
I believe that with the power you've
attained you can defeat Ganon.
My prayers are with you as well.

column3:
だから…救ってあげて
あの人を…
column4: Please, dear friend...save the princess.

column3: もし ゾーラの里に行くことがあったら伝えて
column4: If you ever return to Zora's Domain...

column3: 御父様に「ごめんなさい」って…
column4: Please tell Father that I am sorry.

column3: シドに「頑張るんだよ」って…
column4: Tell Sidon to believe in himself.

column3:
…そして いつか姫様に
「貴女ともっと色んな話を したかった」って…
column4:
And someday, please tell the princess
that I wish I could have told her...
all of the things I never said.

column3:
それから…
ううん何でもない…
column4:
As for you, Link...
Well, never mind.

column3:
…リンク
もし… いつかどこかで…
column4: Link. If you happen to, uh...

column3: 貴方が私の日記を見つける事があっても…
column4:
That is to say, if you should find
my diary somewhere...

column3: 絶対に読まないで
column4: DON'T YOU DARE READ IT!

column3:
あ…大きな声出してごめん…
でも… お願い…
column4:
Oh! I did not mean to raise my voice.
But I do hope you will respect my wish...

column3:
…リンク
一緒に魔物を退治した時の事覚えてる？
column4:
Link. Do you recall the time we went off
to defeat that monster together?

column3:
雷獣山に棲みついたライネルのせいで
里の皆が怯えていた時貴方が来てくれて…
column4:
The Lynel of Ploymus Mountain
was terrorizing us all. But then
you came along.

column3: 二人で一緒に戦って…
column4: You and I fought as one and...

column3: 覚えて… ないかな？
column4: Does any of that sound familiar?

column3:
ねえリンク… 100年前の里での想い出
どの位覚えてる？
column4:
Link... How much do you remember
of what took place between us
100 years ago?

column3:
ゾーラの鎧が貴方にぴったりだった理由とか
忘れちゃったかな…
column4:
Do you know why that Zora Armor
fits you so perfectly?

column3:
思い出してほしい事 いっぱいあるけど
思い出せなくても それはしかたのない事…
column4:
There are many things I hope you will
remember, but if you can't recall those
memories, I suppose it can't be helped.

column3: でも…私は忘れないよ…
column4: As for me...I shall never forget...
